dict.string: if test \! -e "$TM_NEW_FILE"; then TM_YEAR=`date +%Y` \ TM_DATE=`date +%Y-%m-%d` \ TM_USERNAME=`niutil -readprop / /users/\$USER realname` \ AUTHOR_ADDR=$(RA="defaults read AddressBookMe"; cat <<EOA `$RA FirstName` `$RA LastName` \\\\ `$RA StreetAddr1` \\\\ `$RA StreetAddr2` \\\\ `$RA ZipPostal` `$RA City` \\\\ `$RA Email` \\\\ http://www.xxx.yyy/mysite.html EOA) \ perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' \ < template_exam.tex > "$TM_NEW_FILE" fi
